channel.title: Saradomin shield help
channel.description:
Okay so i'm messing around with meta and I have made this : [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2q9dirc.png[/img]
I know it's terrible lol but have I gone about making a shield the correct way? How can I add a saradomin symbol? How do I make sure it fits a player? Thanks :)

item.title: Saradomin shield help
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

amy_webb:

Yes, you’re using primitives which is good to start with. Though, you should try work on your poly, rather then just having it wherever make sure it is there for a reason (shape or colour/design). Make the saradomin symbol with create, it is just easier and then put it infront of the actual model. when fitting it to the character, download the character you need (you can find it somewhere) and go off that.

Thanks, i’ll see what I can do

Read full topic

item.title: Saradomin shield help
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Yes, you’re using primitives which is good to start with. Though, you should try work on your poly, rather then just having it wherever make sure it is there for a reason (shape or colour/design). Make the saradomin symbol with create, it is just easier and then put it infront of the actual model. when fitting it to the character, download the character you need (you can find it somewhere) and go off that.
